price: 51. Haddaan doonnona, waxaan u soo diri laheyn magaalo walba dige25.
arabic: وَلَوۡ شِئۡنَا لَبَعَثۡنَا فِي كُلِّ قَرۡيَةٖ نَّذِيرٗا
footnotes: 25. Wuxuuse Alle doonay inuu soo diro Nabi Muxammad s.c.w. inuu ahaado Rasuulka lagu khatimo Rususha Alle oo dhan, isagoo loo diray dhammaan dadka arlada jooga ilaa Qiyaamaha.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walaw shi'nā labaʿathnā fī kulli qaryatin nadhīran
